title: Design-Based Science Leadership Education Utilizing Reflective Processes

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific problem-solving knowledge and managerial experience
context.additional_context: Immersive learning using VR simulations in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, integrating design thinking processes into science education methodologies to strengthen leadership competencies

learning_goals: Enhancement of systematic scientific education problem analysis skills using the IAES model (Investigate-Apply-Explain-Share)
Learners can develop action plans to improve instructional methodologies based on reflective thinking

Within one week, learners design one science education scenario using VR simulation tools (e.g., Unity, Unreal Engine), submitting deliverables that apply all four design process stages (problem definition-idea sketching-prototyping-testing)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
